text: Anastasia Romanovna (1530–1560) was the first wife of Ivan the Terrible. Anastasia Romanova or Romanovna may also refer to: *Grand Duchess Anastasia Mikhailovna of Russia (1860–1922), daughter of Grand Duke Michael Nikolaevich of Russia *Princess Anastasia of Montenegro, (1868–1935), wife of Grand Duke Nicholas Nikolaevich of Russia *Countess Anastasia Mikhailovna de Torby (1892–1977), morganatic daughter of Grand Duke Michael Mikhailovich of Russia *Grand Duchess Anastasia Nikolaevna of Russia (1901–1918), daughter of Nicholas II of Russia *Anastasia Romanova (skier) (born 1993), Russian ski racer *Anastasia Romanova (weightlifter) (born 1991), Russian female weightlifter
title: Anastasia Romanova (disambiguation)
